items.name: type
items.desc: Select the type of change that you're committing:

options.name: style
options.desc:
style: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code
            (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

options.name: refactor
options.desc: refactor: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

options.name: perf
options.desc: perf: A code change that improves performance

options.name: chore
options.desc:
chore: Changes to the build process or auxiliary tools
            and libraries such as documentation generation

items.name: scope
items.desc: Scope. Could be anything specifying place of the commit change (users, db, poll):

items.name: subject
items.desc: Subject. Concise description of the changes. Imperative, lower case and no final dot:
